column4: hi.. is there anyway i can select which packages i want to be installed for my ubuntu install? it seems to install a lot of apps which i never use. In debian, I used to be able to pick packages manually, and let it download/install only those.. is this possible in ubuntu?
PAE? thats the 4 GB ram hack for x86, right?
okay.. and what does the basics include?
get the alternative install cd, and select CLI only install
